# Let You Down (Peking Duk song)

| producer      =
| chronology    = Peking Duk
| prev_title    = Fake Magic
| prev_year     = 2017
| next_title    = Wasted
| next_year     = 2018
| misc          =
}}
"Let You Down" is a song by Australian electronic music duo Peking Duk featuring Swedish duo Icona Pop. The song was released on 13 October 2017 and has peaked at number 37 on the Australian ARIA Singles Chart. The song features the vocals of Peking Duk member Adam Hyde, marking the first time that either of the duoâ€™s members have performed vocals on one of their songs.
Peking Duk described the song as a "modern heartbreak anthem" and say it was inspired by the 2006 film, Candy, with the story being told from Heath Ledger's perspective.
At the APRA Music Awards of 2019, the song was nominated for Dance Work of the Year.
